title: Deals: Apple Studio Display sees $115 launch discount, M1 iPad Pro $150 off, more
content:
Halfway through the work week, all of today’s best deals are headlined by a launch discount on the new Apple Studio Display. That’s alongside up to $150 off 12.9-inch M1 iPad Pros and a one-day Apple MagSafe Battery Pack discount at $88. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Apple Studio Display sees $115 launch discount, M1 iPad Pro $150 off, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple Studio Display discount has arrived for launch at up to $115 off alongside 2022 all-time lows on 12.9-inch M1 iPad Pro and more.
